actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that corporations will not be required to make installment payments of estimated tax if the amount of the estimated tax is less than $500.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt corporations from the quarterly payment of estimated tax liability if estimated tax liability is less that $500.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that corporations will not be required to make installment payments of estimated tax if the amount of the estimated tax is less than $500.
